did.abstract: One letter, dated 1816, written by Benjamin F. Thompson in Setauket, Long Island to an unnamed individual regarding a business matter.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Benjamin Franklin Thompson (1784-1849) was a Long Island doctor, lawyer, and historian.
